summary: An old Cuban fisherman's dry spell is broken when he hooks a gigantic fish that drags him out to sea. Based on Ernest Hemingway's story.
cast: Spencer Tracy|Felipe Pazos|Harry Bellaver|Richard Alameda|Robert Alderette|Don Alvarado|Don Blackman|Don Diamond|Mary Hemingway|Mauritz Hugo|Mike Morelli|George Nardelli|Jose Portugal|Joey Ray|Carlos Rivero|Tony Rosa
title: El viejo y el mar
